attributes.action: Permanently close Waterloo bridge to vehicle traffic
attributes.additional_details: Failed garden bridge project of 2015 that cost tax payer 15 million was a waste of money let’s put some of the concepts to good use and transform Waterloo bridge
attributes.background: Over the last few days XR has turned Waterloo bridge into a beautiful space for bikes skates and people to meet and talk. I say this should continue and Waterloo bridge should be closed to vehicle traffic and transformed into a new garden bridge project

rejection.details: This would be the responsibility of the local council and not the UK Government or Parliament.
